column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Ozai says : " You 've been away for a long time .
#Text=" Hakoda says : " What 's wrong , Katara ?
#Text=" Katara says : " He left .
#Text=" Hakoda says : " What ?
#Text=" Katara says : " Aang .
#Text=He just took his glider and disappeared .
#Text=He has this ridiculous notion that he has to save the world alone , that it 's all his responsibility .
#Text=" Hakoda says : " Maybe that 's his way of being brave .
#Text=" Katara says : " It 's not brave , it 's selfish and stupid !
#Text=We could be helping him and I know the world needs him , but does n't he know how much we need him , too ?
#Text=How can he just leave us behind ?
#Text=" Hakoda says : " You 're talking about me too , are n't you ?
#Text=" Katara says : " How could you leave us , Dad ?
#Text=I mean , I know we had Gran - Gran , and she loved us , but we were just so lost without you .
#Text=" Hakoda says : " I 'm so sorry , Katara .
#Text=" Katara says : " I understand why you left .
#Text=I really do , and I know that you had to go , so why do I still feel this way ?
#Text=I 'm so sad and angry and hurt !
#Text=" Hakoda says : " I love you more than anything .
#Text=You and your brother are my entire world .
#Text=I thought about you every day when I was gone and every night when I went to sleep , I would lie awake missing you so much it would ache .
#Text="
